faqs.question: Kan utlänningar köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Yes. Foreigners can purchase property in Spain without restrictions through straightforward legal processes. EU citizens require minimal documentation, while non-EU buyers need Spanish tax identification numbers (NIE). Professional legal guidance ensures seamless acquisition and compliance with Spanish property regulations.

faqs.question: Vilka är kostnaderna för att köpa fastighet i Spanien?
faqs.answer: Purchase costs typically include transfer tax (6-10%), notary fees (1-2%), registry fees, and professional legal representation (1-2% of property value). Additional considerations include annual property taxes (0.4-1.1% of cadastral value) and municipal fees. Comprehensive cost breakdowns are provided during the acquisition process.

faqs.question: Kan jag få ett bolån i Spanien som utlänning?
faqs.answer: Yes. Spanish banks and international lenders provide mortgage financing to foreign buyers, typically offering 70-80% loan-to-value ratios with competitive interest rates. EU citizens access financing similar to Spanish residents, while non-EU buyers may require additional documentation and typically receive mortgages through specialized international lending programs.

faqs.question: Hur är levnadskostnaderna på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Cost of living in Costa Blanca remains competitive compared to Northern Europe, with moderate expenses for dining, utilities, and services. Healthcare, education, and transportation costs are reasonable, while property costs vary significantly by location and amenity level. Lifestyle flexibility allows budget optimization based on personal preferences and choices.

faqs.question: Är Costa Blanca bra för pensionärer?
faqs.answer: Excellent. Costa Blanca attracts international retirees through superior healthcare facilities with English-speaking professionals, favorable climate, established expatriate communities providing social integration, and cost-effective living compared to Northern European standards. The region offers cultural engagement, wellness activities, and leisure amenities appealing to retired individuals.

faqs.question: Hur långt är det från Sverige till Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca ligger cirka 1,100 kilometers (680 miles) from London. Flight duration typically ranges from 2-3 hours direct from UK airports, with multiple daily services through major carriers. This accessibility facilitates regular UK visits while maintaining Mediterranean residency advantages.

faqs.question: Hur är vädret på Costa Blanca?
faqs.answer: Costa Blanca features Mediterranean climate with mild winters (10-15°C) and warm summers (28-32°C). The region enjoys over 300 annual sunshine days with minimal rainfall concentrated in autumn months. This consistent climate supports year-round outdoor activities and ensures comfortable living throughout the calendar year.
